thread.section_title: Louison Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy and comfortable hotel
thread.title_full: Cozy and comfortable hotel - Review of Louison Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Veena M
title: Cozy and comfortable hotel
text: Well located in the 6th (although on the outer edge of it) with several metro stops nearby. Hotel is very charming and although the rooms are small, they are comfortable. Staff is very accommodating. The breakfast is quite good and evening drinks and appetizers are a nice touch.
